start.description: You are in a bare-bones starting room with a humming computer terminal.

terminal.description: An old terminal, its screen on but blank.

actions.examine: The terminal hums. The command prompt blinks, waiting.
actions.use: You tap a few keys, but nothing new happens yet.

attic.description: Dust swirls in beams of light between old boxes and forgotten furniture.

cat.description: A sleepy cat curled up on a wooden trunk.

actions.examine: The cat blinks at you and yawns.
actions.pet: The cat purrs so loudly it echoes in the attic.

rocking chair.description: A slightly creaky but inviting rocking chair.

actions.examine: The chair looks very comfortable. The cushion has an indentation the exact size of the cat.

office.description:
A small hexagonal office, lined with shelves of books and maps. 
A big window looks out over the water.

bookshelf.description: A heavy wooden bookshelf packed with titles in several languages.

actions.examine: Many of the books are about Roman History, the Latin language, and architecture.
actions.search:
In addition to books, there are folders full of notes. 
There are no secret treats here.

desk.description: A cluttered desk covered in notes and boxes.

actions.examine: Someone has built a wall to keep cats and pigeons off the keyboard. Rude!.
actions.open box: Inside the box, you find a candy bar.
